meanings.definition: In a manner related to incomplete cleavage during embryonic development.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves only a portion of the cell dividing during cell division.
meanings.sent1: During mitosis, the cell replicated meroblastically, creating two unequal parts.
meanings.sent2: The cell divided meroblastically, resulting in uneven distribution of genetic material.
meanings.sent3: The division was meroblastically lopsided, like a poorly cut cake.
meanings.sent4: Her attention was meroblastically split between work and play.
meanings.sent5: The growth occurred meroblastically, causing an imbalance in the cell structure.
